ygData.subject: RE: Guild Matters
ygData.msgSnippet: From:           	LKW  Subject:        	RE: [sg-everquest] Guild Matters ... I seem to have got what you ve got, Ziltus... this
ygData.messageBody:
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Guild Matters

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>

> I think I've stopped playing EQ for almost 2 weeks or more, and
> surprisingly I didn't missed it at all. ;)
> I login UO once every 2-3 nights, to help my UO guild to settle some
> training and guild matters, I play Jagged Alliance 2 (wow it's a damn cool
> game, the content is really solid), I watch VCDs etc...I just don't missed
> EQ, hehe.

I seem to have got what you've got, Ziltus... this "Bored-with-
levelling-and-nothing-much-else-to-do" EQ disease... you pass to
me one isit?! *heh*

Anyway, I really enjoy JA2 too... I enjoy it so much, I bought the
original one... :)

Frankly, the only gripe I have about the game is that it's hard to tell
whether the enemy can or cannot shoot you if you hide behind this
rock, or that tree...

I also recently acquired Homeworld... this RTS not easy man...


--


Love is in the air...
Get me a gas mask, quick!!!

Cya,
Praetor
